("entity"$$$$Gordon McQueen$$$$Person$$$$Gordon McQueen was a former professional footballer who played as a defender for Manchester United, Leeds, and Scotland’s national team. He was diagnosed with vascular dementia in 2021 and passed away at the age of 70. He began his career at Scottish club St. Mirren and was Britain’s most expensive player when he joined Manchester United for 495,000 pounds. He won the English league title with Leeds and the FA Cup with Manchester United. He made 30 international appearances for Scotland and later managed Scottish team Airdrieonians and coached St. Mirren and Middlesbrough.)
